skills.name: Lament, Nethersea's Ripple
skills.desc: Deals Quantum DMG equal to #1[i]% of Castorice's Max HP to one designated enemy.
skills.simpleDesc: Deals minor Quantum DMG to one enemy.

skills.name: Silence, Wraithfly's Caress
skills.desc:
Consumes #1[i]% of all allies' current HP. Deals Quantum DMG equal to #2[i]% of Castorice's Max HP to one designated enemy and Quantum DMG equal to #3[i]% of Castorice's Max HP to adjacent targets.
If the current HP is insufficient, reduces the current HP down to 1.
If Netherwing is on the battlefield, the Skill becomes "Boneclaw, Doomdrake's Embrace" instead.
skills.simpleDesc: Consumes all allies' HP. Deals Quantum DMG to one enemy and minor Quantum DMG to adjacent targets.

skills.name: Doomshriek, Dawn's Chime
skills.desc:
Summons the memosprite Netherwing and advances its action by 100%. At the same time, deploys the Territory "Lost Netherland," which decreases all enemies' All-Type RES by #4[i]%. If Castorice has the DMG Boost effect from her Talent, then this effect spreads to Netherwing. Netherwing has an initial SPD of #1[i] and a set Max HP equal to #3[i]% of max "Newbud."
After Netherwing experiences #2[i] turns or when its HP is 0, it disappears and dispels the Territory "Lost Netherland."
skills.simpleDesc: Summons the memosprite Netherwing and advances its action by 100%. At the same time, deploys a Territory that decreases All-Type RES for all enemies.

skills.name: Desolation Across Palms
skills.desc:
The maximum limit of "Newbud" is related to the levels of all characters on the battlefield. For every 1 point of HP lost by all allies, Castorice gains 1 point of "Newbud." When "Newbud" reaches its maximum limit, can activate the Ultimate. When allies lose HP, Castorice's and Netherwing's DMG dealt increases by #2[i]%. This effect can stack up to #3[i] time(s), lasting for #4[i] turn(s).
When Netherwing is on the field, "Newbud" cannot be gained through Talent, and every 1 point of HP lost by all allies (except Netherwing) will be converted to an equal amount of HP for Netherwing.
skills.simpleDesc: When any ally loses HP, Castorice gains "Newbud". Increases Castorice's and Netherwing's DMG dealt. When "Newbud" reaches the maximum, Castorice's Ultimate can be used. While Netherwing is on the battlefield, HP lost by any ally unit (except Netherwing) will be converted to an equal amount of HP for Netherwing.

skills.name: Wail, Death's Herald
skills.desc:
After using Technique, enters the "Netherveil" state that lasts for #3[i] seconds. While "Netherveil" is active, enemies are unable to actively approach Castorice.
During "Netherveil," active attacks will cause all enemies within range to enter combat. At the same time, summons the memosprite Netherwing, advances its action by 100%, and deploys the Territory "Lost Netherland." Netherwing has its current HP equal to #2[i]% of max "Newbud." After entering battle, consumes #1[i]% of the current HP of all allies (except Netherwing).
If Netherwing is not summoned after entering battle, Castorice gains "Newbud" by an amount equal to #4[i]% of max "Newbud."
skills.simpleDesc:
Enters the "Netherveil" state. Enemies are unable to actively approach Castorice.
During "Netherveil," attacks will cause all enemies within range to enter combat. At the same time, summons the memosprite Netherwing, advances its action by 100%. Upon entering battle, consumes HP of all allies (except Netherwing).
If Netherwing is not summoned after entering battle, Castorice gains "Newbud" by an amount equal to #4[i]% of max "Newbud."

eidolons.name: Snowbound Maiden, Memory to Tomb
eidolons.desc: When the enemy target's current HP is <nobr>80%</nobr>/<nobr>50%</nobr> of Max HP or lower, the DMG dealt to it by "Boneclaw, Doomdrake's Embrace," "Claw Splits the Veil," "Breath Scorches the Shadow," and "Wings Sweep the Ruins" is <nobr>120%</nobr>/<nobr>140%</nobr> of the original DMG respectively.

eidolons.name: Crown on Wings of Bloom
eidolons.desc: After summoning the memosprite Netherwing, Castorice gains <nobr>2</nobr> stack(s) of "Ardent Will." "Ardent Will" can stack up to <nobr>2</nobr> time(s) and can be used to offset the HP cost of Netherwing's Memosprite Skill, "Breath Scorches the Shadow" and <u>advance Castorice's action</u> by <nobr>100%</nobr>. When using the next Enhanced Skill, Castorice gains "Newbud" by an amount equal to <nobr>30%</nobr> of max "Newbud."

eidolons.name: Pious Pilgrim, Dance in Doom
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>15</nobr>.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>10</nobr>.
Memosprite Talent Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>10</nobr>.

eidolons.name: Rest in Songs of Gloom
eidolons.desc: While Castorice is on the field, all allies' HP restored when receiving healing increases by <nobr>20%</nobr>.

eidolons.name: Pristine Pages, Prophecy as Plume
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>15</nobr>.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>15</nobr>.
Memosprite Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>10</nobr>.

eidolons.name: Await for Years to Loom
eidolons.desc: When Castorice or Netherwing deals DMG, increases Quantum <u>RES PEN</u> by <nobr>20%</nobr>. During Netherwing's attacks, can reduce enemy Toughness regardless of Weakness Types. When breaking Weaknesses, triggers the Quantum Weakness Break effect. And the number of Bounces for Netherwing's Talent "Wings Sweep the Ruins" additionally increases by <nobr>3</nobr>.

embedBonusSkill.name: Contained Dark Tide
embedBonusSkill.desc: After ally targets (excluding Netherwing) receive healing, converts <nobr>100%</nobr> of the healed amount into "Newbud." If Netherwing is on the field, this is converted to Netherwing's HP instead. Each ally target can accumulate a conversion amount up to <nobr>12%</nobr> of the max "Newbud." After any unit takes action, all units reset their accumulated conversion amount.

embedBonusSkill.name: Inverted Torch
embedBonusSkill.desc: When Castorice's current HP is higher than or equal to <nobr>50%</nobr> of her Max HP, her SPD increases by <nobr>40%</nobr>. When Netherwing uses "Breath Scorches the Shadow" and deals fatal damage to all enemies on the field or brings them to a point where their HP cannot be reduced further, Netherwing's SPD increases by <nobr>100%</nobr>, lasting for 1 turn.

embedBonusSkill.name: Where The West Wind Dwells
embedBonusSkill.desc: Each time Netherwing uses "Breath Scorches the Shadow," the DMG dealt increases by <nobr>30%</nobr>. This effect stacks up to <nobr>6</nobr> time(s) and lasts until the end of this turn.
